content.text:
# Da gfeide Hund (Award)

The Da gfeide Hund  (engl. the keen dog) is a language and culture award, granted since 2024 by the Association for Bavarian language and dialects (Förderverein Bairische Sprache und Dialekte e. V. - FBSD) to upcoming artists, for which Bavarian as a language is an elementary part of their work. The price recognizes contemporary representation of Bavarian in art and is endowed with 4.000 €.
Laureates
*2024 Beni Hafner - Oimara, bavarian musician from Tegernsee
*2025 Mathias Kellner, songwriter and comedian from Lower Bavaria
References
